name: Sad Little Blue
description:
Little Blue is a sad little soul in search of his lost diamonds. In order to make him happy again, you have to collect at least 150 points in order to save him. Tread carefully around the volcanic rocks  - Blue is very Fragile and can easily fall off platforms. 

Use arrow keys on keyboard to navigate - up arrow is jump. 

Notes: Press spacebar to restart if you get stuck. However, there is a current bug where the music repeats and loops over the song  so I would recommend refreshing the page instead.
